mapper.select: SELECT customer_idx, customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_password, customer_joined, customer_address1, customer_address2, customer_money, customer_authority FROM customer

SELECT customer_idx, customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_password, customer_joined, customer_zipcode, customer_address1, customer_address2, customer_money, customer_authority FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer(customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_password, customer_zipcode, customer_address1, customer_address2) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{password1}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2})
